sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Asọmpi ebirila ọkụ n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 2020, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ na 2021 ka a na-enwe ya.
A ga-enwe asọmpi narị atọ na iri atọ na itoolu (339 events), n'ime ụdị egwuregwu iri atọ na atọ.
Ama egwuregwu dị icheiche a ga-anọ sọọ mpi dị iri anọ na abụọ (42).
Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: Ka o si aga n'egwuregwu Olympics 2020
Lee ụmụ Igbo ga-anọchị anya Naịjirịa n'asọmpi Olympics 2020
Akụkọ a ga na-egosi gị mba kacha nweta nturuugo ọlaedo, ọlaọcha na ọlanchara.
Na Satọde, abali iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị ka Yang Qian nke mba Chaịna ritere ọlaedo n'asọmpi egbe (rifle), nke mere ka Chaịna bụrụ mba mbụ nwetara ọlaedo n'egwuregwu Olympics nke afọ 2020.
Ogoogo
